question: What leadership insights have been shared by executives at companies that signed vendor deals for data analytics in the last year?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that signed vendor deals for data analytics in the last year. [CompanyDealMaster]
Extract leadership insights from executives at the identified companies. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Filter leadership insights to include only those from the companies identified in the previous step. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt, CompanyDealMaster]
